Interface API

All Known Implementing Classes:
TopologyAPI
public interface API

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteTopology(String topologyID)
    Deletes from memory the topology with the specified ID if found.

    Topology

    Reads the specified JSON file containing a topology, stores it in memory, and returns it as a POJO.
    boolean
    writeJSON(String fileName, String topologyID)
    Searches for the topology with the specified ID and write it as JSON object in the specified JSON file.

  • Method Details

    • readJSON

      Topology readJSON(String fileName)
      Reads the specified JSON file containing a topology, stores it in memory, and returns it as a POJO.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the JSON file to be read.
      Returns:
      The corresponding topology object to the JSON object.

    • writeJSON

      boolean writeJSON(String fileName, String topologyID)
      Searches for the topology with the specified ID and write it as JSON object in the specified JSON file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The resulting JSON file after writing.
      topologyID - The ID of the topology object to be written.
      Returns:
      True if writing is complete, otherwise false.

    • queryTopologies

      List<Topology> queryTopologies()
      Returns:
      The current topologies in the memory.

    • findTopology

      Topology findTopology(String topologyID)
      Searches in the memory for a topology with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      topologyID - The ID of the topology to be found.
      Returns:
      The topology object if found in memory, otherwise null.

    • deleteTopology

      boolean deleteTopology(String topologyID)
      Deletes from memory the topology with the specified ID if found.
      Parameters:
      topologyID - The ID of the topology to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if found and deleted successfully, otherwise false.

    • queryDevices

      List<Component> queryDevices(String topologyID)
      Returns the list of components of the topology with specified ID if found.
      Parameters:
      topologyID - The ID of the topology.
      Returns:
      A list of the components of the topology.

    • queryDevicesWithNetListNode

      List<Component> queryDevicesWithNetListNode(String topologyID, String netListNodeID)
      Returns a list of the components of the topology of the specified ID that contains the specified value in its components' netlist.
      Parameters:
      topologyID - The ID of the topology.
      netListNodeID - The value of the components' netlist to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The list of components of the topology the contains the specified value.
